messages.message: So this is where we may need another section for integrations. Because filenet is not a drive but it is a storage system we could pull from. There are a ton out there like CSAA which uses NICE
as in we would want a flow step called “Download from” and the parameters would be “Filenet”, “NICE”, etc?

I'd imagine we'd want an app or place to place various integrations and in flow you would call the app in flow which houses the integrations. If we keep the theme that Flow is the orchestrator and not an actual app that computation
that concept is currently “Fetcher” right now for us
Yeah it will be interesting to see how Fetcher evolves into either Integrator, or Fetcher -> Webscraper

right — i’d look to build out some eng presence in India to help manage some of this work — Hari has context on Fetcher — but we need some more engineers to help us build out the Integration / Webscraper side of the world

as an immediate fix, we can always write custom code using a Custom Fetcher which reads from one of those integrations.

For example, we have that for Filenet already @Hari
